actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to allow absentee ballots in Federal elections to be mailed by voters free of postage.

summary.text: Allows absentee ballots in federal elections to be mailed free of postage, except for any mail matter transmitted under the provisions of the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act.

titles.title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to allow absentee ballots in Federal elections to be mailed by voters free of postage.
